price: Ashe, ba ka gani ba, lalle ne, Allah Yã saukar da ruwa* daga sama, sai ƙasa ta wãyi gari kõriya? Lalle Allah Mai tausasawa ne, Mai ƙididdigewa.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَتُصۡبِحُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُخۡضَرَّةًۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٞ
footnotes: * Ya misalta Alƙur'ãni da ruwan girgije. Kamar yadda ruwa ke sauka daga sama ya rãya ƙasã haka Alƙur'ãni yake sauka ya rãya zukãta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samāi māan fatuṣ'biḥu al-arḍu mukh'ḍarratan inna al-laha laṭīfun khabīrun
